item.title: Project I: Car Price Prediction
item.description: This Repository contains Files related to Model Building and Deployment using Flask and Heroku. In this project I have predicted the Car price given the data from kaggle. Used Ramdom Forest Regressor for model building I got the RMSE score of â€“ 2.005. Githhub Repository->

item.title: Project II: Restaurant Review Prediction
item.description: This repository contains files regarding the Model Buliding and Deployment using Flask and Heroku. I have build a model which predicts the restaurant review as GOOD / BAD based on customer reviews. Used various NLP techniques for creating the corpus and text cleaning. I was able to achieve an accuracy of 78.05% using Multinomial Naive Bayes theorem. Githhub Repository->
